algorithm_technique: Iterate through adjacent elements and check parity using bitwise AND.
problem_summary_simple: Check if an array alternates between odd and even numbers.
problem_summary_technical: Verify that for every adjacent pair of elements, their parities are different using the bitwise AND operator.
key_insights: The core condition is that adjacent elements must have different parities.
The bitwise AND operation `x & 1` efficiently determines the parity of a number (0 for even, 1 for odd).
The condition `nums[i]&1 != nums[i+1]&1` checks if parities are different.
